faq.no_answer_title: Can't find what you're looking for?
faq.no_answer_desc: Our support team is always ready to help via Discord 24/7.

preview.q: Can I see a preview before purchasing?
preview.a: Yes, you can contact us via Discord to request a preview or ask for more details.

support.a: Yes, we have a support team ready to help 24/7, and lifetime free updates are included.

payment.q: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.a: We accept Credit/Debit Cards (Stripe), PromptPay, and Account Balance.

commission_time.q: How long does a Commission take?
commission_time.a: It depends on complexity. Generally simple UI takes 3-5 days, complex ones 1-2 weeks.

revisions.a: For Commissions, you get 3 free revisions. Additional revisions may incur extra charges.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Last Updated: December 1, 2024
terms.hero_desc: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using QR Studio services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.contact_hint: If you have any questions about the Terms of Service, contact us at

s1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
s1.content: By accessing and using the QR Studio website, you accept and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our services.

s2.title: 2. Description of Service
s2.content: QR Studio provides Script and UI sales for FiveM, including custom UI services. All products are digital goods delivered via a License Key system.

s3.title: 3. User Account
s3.content: You must create an account via Discord to use our services. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. QR Studio is not liable for any loss or damage resulting from your failure to comply with this security obligation.

s4.title: 4. Purchase and Payment
s4.content: All purchases are processed via Stripe or account balance. All prices are in Thai Baht (THB) and include VAT. Upon successful payment, you will receive your License Key via email and in your Dashboard.

s5.title: 5. License and Usage
s5.content: Purchased licenses are for personal use or single server use only. Redistribution, resale, or sharing of License Keys is strictly prohibited. Violation may result in license termination.

s6.title: 6. Refund Policy
s6.content: As our products are digital, we do not offer refunds once the License Key has been delivered. However, if a product is defective or does not function as described, please contact support within 7 days.

s7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
s7.content: All products sold on QR Studio are the intellectual property of QR Studio or their authorized creators. Reproduction, distribution, or modification without written permission is prohibited.

s8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
s8.content: QR Studio does not warrant that the service will be error-free or uninterrupted. We are not liable for any indirect, special, or consequential damages.

s9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
s9.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon posting on the website. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

s10.title: 10. Contact
s10.content: If you have questions regarding these terms, please contact us via Discord or email at support@qrstudio.com

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Last Updated: December 1, 2024
privacy.hero_desc: QR Studio prioritizes your data security and privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information transparently.
privacy.contact_hint: For further questions, contact our legal department at

s1.title: 1. Information We Collect
s1.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as username, email, and Discord data when creating an account, as well as transaction data when purchasing products.

s2.title: 2. How We Use Information
s2.content: We use your information to: provide and improve our platform, process transactions, send notifications and updates, respond to inquiries and provide support, and prevent fraud/ensure security.

s3.title: 3. Data Sharing
s3.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share data with trusted service providers (e.g., Stripe for payments) to facilitate our services.

s4.title: 4. Data Security
s4.content: We use appropriate security measures to protect your data, including SSL encryption, password hashing, and access controls.

s5.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
s5.content: We use cookies to improve your experience, maintain login sessions, and analyze website usage. You can disable cookies in your browser, though it may affect some functions.

s6.title: 6. Your Rights
s6.content: You have the right to: access your personal data, correct inaccurate data, request deletion, and opt-out of marketing communications.

s7.title: 7. Data Retention
s7.content: We retain your data as long as necessary for the purposes collected or as required by law. Transaction data is kept for accounting and tax purposes.

s8.title: 8. Third-Party Services
s8.content: Our website may contain links to third-party services. We are not responsible for their privacy policies. Please read their policies before using their services.

s9.title: 9. Policy Changes
s9.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new policy.

s10.title: 10. Contact Us
s10.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at privacy@qrstudio.com or via Discord.

license.title: License Policy
license.subtitle: License Usage Policy
license.hero_desc: To ensure fair service and maintain software quality, QR Studio hereby states the License policy and agreement for all customers as follows:
license.protection_desc: QR Studio reserves the right to modify these terms at any time without prior notice. However, we will post significant changes on our website and Discord.

s1.title: 1. Usage Rights
s1.content: When you purchase a product from QR Studio, you receive a license to use the software on specified servers only. This license is personal and non-transferable.

s2.title: 2. Usage Restrictions
s2.content: Modification of core logic for resale or redistribution is prohibited without written permission from QR Studio.

s3.title: 3. IP Whitelist System
s3.content: Most of our scripts are bound to an IP Whitelist for security. You can manage IP changes via your Dashboard according to the specified quota.

s4.title: 4. Copyright Infringement
s4.content: Attempts to Crack, Deobfuscate, or Leak products will result in immediate license revocation and a permanent ban from all services without refund.

s5.title: 5. Warranty and Updates
s5.content: We continuously update products to support the latest framework versions (ESX/QB). You receive lifetime free updates for the purchased product.

refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.subtitle: Refund Policy
refund.important: Important: No refunds are provided once a product is confirmed and delivered.
refund.contact_hint: If you have questions about this policy, please contact Discord Support before purchasing.

s1.title: 1. No Refund Policy
s1.content: As our products are digital goods and software accessible immediately after payment, we have a strict 'No Refund Policy' once an order is confirmed and delivered to your account.

s2.title: 2. Order Confirmation
s2.content: Please verify product details, supported framework versions, and system requirements thoroughly before payment. Purchasing constitutes acceptance of these terms.

s3.title: 3. Product Issues
s3.content: If a product does not function as specified or contains bugs, we will provide technical support and fixes until the product meets its stated features. Contact our support channels for assistance.

s4.title: 4. Exceptions
s4.content: Refunds are only considered in cases of payment system errors (e.g., double payment) or if we fail to deliver the product within the specified timeframe.
